rows.label: qst501802_msg0001
rows.name:
What I'm looking out for in this
auction is a Tome of Mors.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0002
rows.name:
Most of the tomes in the auction are
written in Ancient Nopon, but there's a
rumor a Mortian tome might show up!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0003
rows.name:
With all the money you've brought,
I bet I can win against anyone else
foolish enough to bid for it!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0005
rows.name: Looks like it's about to begin.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0006
rows.name: Ooh, I'm getting a little nervous...

rows.label: qst501802_msg0007
rows.name: Next item is this Tome of Mors!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0008
rows.name:
Full of strange symbols nobody can
read! Text completely useless!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0009
rows.name:
Tome itself quite heavy though,
so maybe useful as doorstop.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0010
rows.name: Start bidding at 1G!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0014
rows.name: Oohhhh!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm not a fan of Nopon auctions.
They're always so lazily-paced.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0016
rows.name:
Everyone's reluctant to raise the bid
because they want to get things for
as cheap as they possibly can.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0017
rows.name: But I want that tome no matter what!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0018
rows.name:
You know how much we ought
to bid, right? Let's finish this in
one fell swoop!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0019
rows.name: How much should we bid?

rows.label: qst501802_msg0022
rows.name: Meh-meh?!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0023
rows.name: Whoaaaa!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0024
rows.name: Outrageous!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0025
rows.name:
Hate to admit defeat,
but 20G was limit for me...

rows.label: qst501802_msg0032
rows.name: No way?!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0033
rows.name: Whoaaaa!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0034
rows.name:
Such big leap up!
Never see anything like it!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0035
rows.name: Me can not possibly compete with that.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0042
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-meeeehhhhhhh?!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0043
rows.name: You sure not add zero by accident?!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0044
rows.name:
What kind of nincompoop pays
30,000 for doorstop?!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0045
rows.name:
What so great about book
nobody can read?

rows.label: qst501802_msg0046
rows.name:
Heheh! Sounds like the words
of a bunch of sore losers to me!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0051
rows.name:
Going...going...gone!
Tome of Mors goes to
high-bidding Blade over there!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0052
rows.name:
Hahah! Thanks for that.
This is just what I wanted!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0053
rows.name:
I was impressed by your decision,
by the way.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0054
rows.name:
Personally, I thought we'd have to go
up to about 100,000G to satisfy them.

rows.label: qst501802_msg0055
rows.name: Looks like you got us a real bargain!

rows.label: qst501802_msg0056
rows.name: Don't bid

rows.label: qst501802_msg0057
rows.name: Hey, c'mon... Really?

rows.label: qst501802_msg0058
rows.name:
We've come this far, so you have to
stay committed!
